animeTitle: Everything Started When I Became a Furnace
otherNames: Everything Started When I Became a Furnace, It All Started When I Became a Furnace, My 1000th Lifetime as a Furnace, Yiqie Cong Wo Chengwei Lu Ding Kaishi, Yīqiè Cóng Wǒ Chéngwéi Lú Dǐng Kāishǐ, 一切从我成为炉鼎开始, 千度目の人生〜搾取され体質から脱出した男の逆襲, 인생 1000회차에서 살아남기
synopsis: My name is Ye Yan, a Cauldron who has been reborn for 999 times. This time, I was reborn as a formal disciple of the leader of Yunyan Sect. But in private, I was a Cauldron brought up by her. When I was about to be taken, the system awoke and brought me from the trap. The mystery of my origin is to be revealed...
